------------------ Thank you for registering ------------------ Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thank you for registering for: {{my.EventName:default=edit me}}. Save this email for details on the webcast.
LIVE WEBCAST DATE: {{my.EventDate:default=edit me}} LIVE WEBCAST TIME: {{my.EventTime:default=edit me}}
Use the link below to enter the webcast up to 15 minutes before the start.
WEBCAST LINK: CLICK HERE TO JOIN <[[{{member.webinar url}}]]>
Thank you and enjoy the webcast! {{my.AddtoCalendar:default=edit me}} Copyright © 2016 Nokia
